question: The revolutionary organisation ‘Abhinav Bharat Society’ was founded in 1904 by:
explanation: Abhinav Bharat Society was founded by Vinayak Damodar Savarkar and his brother Ganesh Damodar Savarkar in 1904. Vinayak Damodar Savarkar was a student of Fergusson College at Pune. The former name of the organization was Mitra Mela. In the year 1952, the society was disbanded.
